Memory & Checkpointing â€‹

VarsayÄ±lan olarak LangGraph her invoke Ã§aÄŸrÄ±sÄ±nda sÄ±fÄ±rdan baÅŸlar â€” geÃ§miÅŸ konuÅŸma hatÄ±rlanmaz. Checkpointing ile konuÅŸma geÃ§miÅŸini saklayabilirsin.

Checkpointer Nedir? â€‹

Checkpointer, her graf adÄ±mÄ±ndan sonra state'i kaydeder. AynÄ± thread_id ile tekrar Ã§aÄŸÄ±rÄ±ldÄ±ÄŸÄ±nda kaldÄ±ÄŸÄ± yerden devam eder.

python
from langgraph.checkpoint.memory import MemorySaver

checkpointer = MemorySaver()
app = workflow.compile(checkpointer=checkpointer)

Thread ID ile KonuÅŸma YÃ¶netimi â€‹

python
# Her kullanÄ±cÄ±/oturum iÃ§in benzersiz thread_id
config = {"configurable": {"thread_id": "user_123_session_1"}}

# Ä°lk mesaj
result1 = app.invoke(
    {"user_query": "Merhaba!", "intent": "", "final_answer": ""},
    config=config
)

# Ä°kinci mesaj â€” aynÄ± thread_id, geÃ§miÅŸi hatÄ±rlar
result2 = app.invoke(
    {"user_query": "Az Ã¶nce ne dedim?", "intent": "", "final_answer": ""},
    config=config
)

KonuÅŸma GeÃ§miÅŸi iÃ§in State TasarÄ±mÄ± â€‹

Checkpointing sadece state'i kaydeder. KonuÅŸma geÃ§miÅŸini state'e eklemelisin:

python
from typing import Annotated
from langgraph.graph.message import add_messages
from langchain_core.messages import BaseMessage

class ConversationalState(TypedDict):
    messages: Annotated[list[BaseMessage], add_messages]
    intent: str
    final_answer: str

add_messages fonksiyonu, yeni mesajlarÄ± listeye ekler (Ã¼zerine yazmaz).

Tam KonuÅŸmalÄ± Ajan Ã–rneÄŸi â€‹

python
from langchain_core.messages import HumanMessage, AIMessage, SystemMessage

def conversational_expert(state: ConversationalState) -> dict:
    # TÃ¼m geÃ§miÅŸ mesajlar dahil
    messages = [
        SystemMessage(content="Sen yardÄ±msever bir asistansÄ±n.")
    ] + state["messages"]  # GeÃ§miÅŸ + yeni mesaj

    response = llm.invoke(messages)
    return {"messages": [AIMessage(content=response.content)]}

# KullanÄ±m
config = {"configurable": {"thread_id": "conv_1"}}

# Tur 1
app.invoke({"messages": [HumanMessage("AdÄ±n ne?")]}, config)

# Tur 2 â€” ilk turu hatÄ±rlar
app.invoke({"messages": [HumanMessage("Bana tekrar sÃ¶yle")]}, config)

SQLite ile KalÄ±cÄ± HafÄ±za â€‹

MemorySaver geÃ§icidir (uygulama kapanÄ±nca silinir). SQLite ile kalÄ±cÄ± hale getir:

bash
pip install langgraph-checkpoint-sqlite
python
from langgraph.checkpoint.sqlite import SqliteSaver

with SqliteSaver.from_conn_string("./memory.db") as checkpointer:
    app = workflow.compile(checkpointer=checkpointer)
    # ... uygulamayÄ± Ã§alÄ±ÅŸtÄ±r

GeÃ§miÅŸ Durumu Okuma â€‹

python
config = {"configurable": {"thread_id": "user_123"}}

# Mevcut state'i oku
current_state = app.get_state(config)
print(current_state.values)

# TÃ¼m geÃ§miÅŸi oku
for state in app.get_state_history(config):
    print(state.step, state.values)
